stoneRoomFacesDescriptions.0: The stone walls are smooth to the touch
stoneRoomFacesDescriptions.1: A spider web is caught within your fingers
stoneRoomFacesDescriptions.2: The hard, stone walls is cold to the touch
stoneRoomFacesDescriptions.3: The walls are lined with black drapes
stoneRoomFacesDescriptions.4: The room is built and lined with crudely constructed bricks
stoneRoomFacesDescriptions.5: Moss and lichen cling to the now slimy walls
